entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 a.m. ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 9:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 6 km

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
